name: Cyber Dodge Demo
description:
Presentation 

Cyber Dodge is a skill-based Runner / Die & Retry that takes place in Tron's atmosphere. Travel throw various levels, master your abilities to overcome the obstacles.

Atmosphere

The neon atmosphere with a Synthwave based soundtrack will throw you into the speed and action of the game. You will learn more and more abilities Double-jump, Wall-jump, Hovering, etc, that you will need to master in order to complete the levels. An addictive gameplay that will challenge your skill.

Cyber dodge is highly based on skill and challenge. Will you be up to it ? How far will you be able to go ?

After you played the demo, feel free to give your feedback on Instagram or Twitter

Follow us if you want to know more about the project progress :)

You also can wishlist the game on Steam to support us!
